price: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, “Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment.”
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَنۡ أَنذِرۡ قَوۡمَكَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يَأۡتِيَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
